newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian shares unchanged near highs into holiday.
newsitem.headline: Russian shares unchanged near highs into holiday.

text.p: Leading Russian shares closed almost unchanged on Thursday from Wednesday's levels.
** The Russian Trading System 22-share index closed at 338.53 after 338.70 on Wednesday. The index record was 349.27 on February 20.
** Market turnover rose to $31.4 million from $28.1 million but was below the $40 million level generally seen as healthy.
** UES national power company led market volume with $10.5 million, breaking 28 cents during the day but closing at $0.2798 after $0.2775.
** Natural gas monopoly Gazprom dropped to $0.620
